Personally, I think chocolate is fucking disgusting and vanilla is FtW!!!
/discuss. :D

item.title: Chocolate or Vanilla?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:23, topic:429122”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=531817.msg3886595#msg3886595 date=1326496151]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=531817.msg3886582#msg3886582 date=1326494761]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=531817.msg3886562#msg3886562 date=1326493743]

For flavors (like ice cream), I like chocolate better.

However, I can’t eat actual chocolate except for very small amounts or the taste starts to bother me.
[/quote]How do you keep the dementors away?
[/quote]The wispy white stuff that I shoot out of my wand

I see we are both masters of the whip cream.
[/quote]Pretty sure it’s called a patronus…[/quote]
Shh shh, don’t ruin this moment.
